patthana21.49:1.1_0: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.49:2.1_0: Naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.49:3.1_0: (Naāsavañceva naanāsavaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighamūlepi purimanayena tīṇiyeva.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe…
patthana21.49:4.1_0: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
